thread.section_title: The Bentley Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Weekday stay
thread.title_full: Weekday stay - Review of The Bentley Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Terence M
title: Weekday stay
text: Good location, near hospitals. Good lication for restaurants. Room was small. Wifinshould be free in room, not just in lobby. We could hear outside nouse, cars and people talking.. Had a hard time extending my stay during a snow storm while my husband was in hospital. Coffee shoul be free for hotel guests. Woild be nice to have a place to sit down and order breakfast or lunch
